Articles.Content:
This is actually my first stable, landable plane! its the boeing 747!

needs this mod to work:

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10838.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10838.0)

Pics:

> 
> HAB:
> 
> ![2iuqiap.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/2iuqiap.png)
> 
> (it also has realistic control surfaces, including the rudder).
> 
> takeoff:
> 
> ![25tyxra.png](http://i47.tinypic.com/25tyxra.png)
> 
> Touchdown! its actually my first landing w/o blowing up.
> 
> ![68tok6.png](http://i45.tinypic.com/68tok6.png)
> 
> stopped
> 
> flight report:
> 
> ![nl9b1t.png](http://i45.tinypic.com/nl9b1t.png)

Hope you like it! it can even land at 10 fps like i did. 8)

NOTE: the 10 fps was because of my computer, not the plane.

Im gonna upload a better range version, and a cargo version.

8/10 for the plane, but Boing 747 look a like?

I\'m sure you can come up with something closer

![747-8i_inflight_580.jpg](http://www.boeing.com/commercial/747family/images/747-8i_inflight_580.jpg)

I would suggest altering the wings heavily. The 747 has wings angled slightly up and back, for stability and ease of takeoff, and the tailfins are placed higher than the front wings. Here\'s one I made in 15 minutes:

> ![LQwQj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/LQwQj.jpg)
> ![9cvlk.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9cvlk.jpg)
> 
> ![v78Fs.png](http://i.imgur.com/v78Fs.png)

Note the wing angles in the last picture. It goes a long way toward making a real-looking 747.

Mine handles well, if a bit slowly, and there\'s lots of room for improvement.
It\'s not like the real 747 handles like a fighter either, so I\'d say it\'s good.

> 
> I would suggest altering the wings heavily. The 747 has wings angled slightly up and back, for stability and ease of takeoff, and the tailfins are placed higher than the front wings. Here\'s one I made in 15 minutes:
> 
> 
>

> > ![9cvlk.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9cvlk.jpg)

> Note the wing angles in the last picture. It goes a long way toward making a real-looking 747.
> 
> Mine handles well, if a bit slowly, and there\'s lots of room for improvement.

I know, but remember this is my first ACTUALLY FLYABLE plane, so i didnt go into much detail.

and i could not seem to find a way of placing the tailfins higher. ???

> 
> I know, but remember this is my first ACTUALLY FLYABLE plane, so i didnt go into much detail.
> 
> and i could not seem to find a way of placing the tailfins higher. ???

Just move the tailfins up, and then use WASDQE to rotate them back to horizontal

Yeah, uh, guys, there isn\'t another deck is there? No, I made one with 2 DECKS! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> ![2hmhi4m.png](http://i50.tinypic.com/2hmhi4m.png)
It\'s the A380 that\'s got two decks...
We\'re going for the look of a 747, though. The two-deck thing would at most be a texture edit. What you have may have two decks, but it doesn\'t look like a 747.

> 
> It\'s the A380 that\'s got two decks...

747 has one too, it\'s just shorter

> 
> Yeah, uh, guys, there isn\'t another deck is there? No, I made one with 2 DECKS! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > ![2hmhi4m.png](http://i50.tinypic.com/2hmhi4m.png)

No offence, but it looks anything but a 747 (exept the 2nd deck)
That\'s \'cause it\'s not. It was for RP, and was the Koeing 848 (747 848, get it?)
